descriptionHtml:
Description:Please Read!!!

Tank is a basic follower mod that i have decided to create. He is Not custom voiced but is very good at fighting. I have tested him out a little more this time and seems to work better. I use Skyre so i'm not sure if he will die as often as some Skyre players. Please tell me :D.

Instillation: I highly recommend NMM as it is how I installed this.

Uninstallation: Dismiss Tank and uninstall the mod.

Location: You can find him in Riverwood. I felt that Faendal and Sven weren't very good starter followers. He is very tough for the beginning but once it gets to the dragons i'm sure you will need to give him better armor.

Known issues: None so far. If you have any issues, please let me know and I will try to fix them as soon as i can.

Acknowledgements: Sinzora helped me when I needed it. Nothing was taken from Sinzora during this mod.

I have made this great mod as well http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56243/?

[Color=turquoise]#TweakTeam[/color]
author: Psychobreach
